DOC.brief_summary: data from the wistar institute indicated that this anti-body labeled with iodine-125 would localized in the tumor cells of high grade gliomas of the brain. the project combines surgery, radiation therapy, chemotherapy with the labeled antibody in a prospective phase II trial in this disease entity.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Study of Adjuvant Use of Anti-Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor EGFR-425 in High Grade Gliomas
DOC.criteria: all cases above 18 years of age
DOC.keyword: high grade gliomas of the brain
